title: Information Systems Security Professional
extract: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) is an independent information security certification granted by the International Information System Security Certification Consortium, also known as (ISC)². ... CISSP is a globally recognized certification in the field of IT security.
extract_html: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) is an independent information security certification granted by the International Information System Security Certification Consortium, also known as (ISC)². ... CISSP is a globally recognized certification in the field of IT security.
